name: The Art of Eating's Beet Salad with Anchovies
description: This recipe for Beet Salad with Anchovies from The Art of Eating Cookbook comes from a book of traditional Provençal dishes, and is one that's certainly stood the test of time. Sweetly roasted beets with pungent bits of anchovy dressed with a bright vinaigrette, this is a dish that's simple to prepare but complex and truly delicious on the plate.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound beets, cooked tender, cooled, and peeled
2 or more cloves garlic, peeled and halved

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the salt from the anchovies, strip the filets from the bones, and rinse them. Cut the beets into small dice. Slice the anchovy filets into bits, and add them to the beets along with the garlic. Make a vinaigrette with the vinegar, oil, salt, and pepper, and dress the beets with it. Mix well and taste for salt (the sweet beets will stand a lot).
